alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 27 at 7:36AM MDT until April 28 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches, with locally higher amounts of over 6 inches possible below 7500 feet, and 8 to 12 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Walsenburg Vicinity and Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Feet, Trinidad Vicinity and Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Feet, and Eastern Las Animas County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Areas of heavy blowing snow and near-zero visibility possible at times. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
